{{also|杂|卒}}
==Translingual==

===Etymology===
In Japanese, {{Han simp|卒|t1=九}}. Compare [[雑]] and [[杂]], from [[雜]].

===Han character===
{{Han char|rn=24|rad=十|as=02|sn=4|four=|canj=KNJ|ids=⿱九十}}

====Usage notes====
In Japanese, used officially as simplification in compound characters such as [[酔]], but unofficially in handwriting (as {{w|ryakuji}}) as a simplification of [[卒]], such as writing 卆業 for [[卒業]].

====Derived characters====
* [[伜]] [[忰]] [[枠]] [[砕]] [[粋]] [[酔]] [[翆]]

====References====
* {{Han ref|kx=0156.020|dkj=02701|dj=0353.030|hdz=10059.040|uh=5346}}
